column1: id,channel,rating,raw_text
1,app_store,5,Love this app! use it every day for ordering pizza.  super   fast delivery!!!
2,in_app,1,"I HATE the new update...crashes   every time I try to pay. pls fix asap."
3,in_app,2,delivery was late late late. driver said 'system glitch'. not cool.
4,email,3,"Great UI, but why do you need my phone # again???"
5,email,1,Support didn't reply to my email (john.doe@example.com). horrible service.
6,in_app,3,"the app is ok-ish, but search is sooo slow on my old phone (Android 8)."
7,web_form,2,signup screen freezes on step 2/3... been like this for WEEKS
8,app_store,4,"I love the app, but prices seem HIGHER than website??"
9,twitter,2,"not intuitive. had to google ""how to change address foodly app"" lol"
10,in_app,4,Feature request: dark mode pls. eyes hurt at night :(
11,email,1,Order #12345 never arrived. my phone number: (555) 298-1122. refund??
12,in_app,2,app kept saying 'invalid cvv' but card works fine in other places.
13,app_store,3,"Too many push notifications - 3 in ONE hour, seriously???"
14,web_form,4,"pretty good, but add PayPal / Apple Pay / google pay options."
15,in_app,3,"Why can't I schedule an order for tomorrow morning 8am?"
16,app_store,2,the app logged me out 2x today after I changed my password.
17,chat,4,"Live chat agent was helpful, but the bot before that was useless."
18,in_app,1,"I uninstalled + reinstalled, still stuck on loading screen...."
19,twitter,2,"restaurant ratings feel fake, all 5 stars lol #sus"
20,email,1,"promo code SPRING2025 didn't work, even tho email said VALID till 05/31."
21,web_form,5,great variety of restaurants; love the vegan + gluten free options in my area.
22,in_app,2,"Stop asking for location access ""always"". 'While using app' should be enough."
23,in_app,2,BUG: can't delete old addresses; city field is greyed out.
24,app_store,5,I like that you remember my last order - very convenient :)
25,twitter,2,delivery fee + service fee + tip = too $$ for small orders.
26,email,3,"Hi,I like the app overall but the order history page loads super slowly. Thanks."
27,in_app,1,language randomly switches to Spanish even tho my phone is set to English.
28,app_store,4,"Loyal user for 2+ years, but lately the ETA times are way off."
29,web_form,3,map doesn't show my exact address; had to drop the pin 3 houses away.
30,twitter,4,Just tried Foodly for the first time... pretty smooth experience tbh :)
